action.action-desc: Mr. Kirk introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to waive the state of good repair certification requirement for participants in the pilot program for expedited project delivery.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Expedite Transit Act of 2015.

section.header: Waiver of state of good repair certification for pilot program for expedited project delivery
section.text: Section 20008(b) of the Moving Ahead for Progress in the 21st Century Act (49 U.S.C. 5309 note; Public Law 112–141) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (5)(D), by inserting before a certification the following: except as provided in paragraph (8),; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.header: Waiver of state of good repair certification
paragraph.text: The Secretary may waive the requirement under paragraph (5)(D) for a recipient that seeks to carry out a core capacity improvement project if the Secretary determines that the project will allow the recipient to make substantial progress in achieving a state of good repair for the recipient's public transportation system.
